label: InspectionInstructions
comment: Information of an instructive nature that describes how to conduct an inspection.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
A type, expressed as text, of these packaging instructions.
The code specifying the interpretation for this laboratory instruction.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the latest update of this set of inspection instructions.
A procedure, expressed as text, for a set of inspection instructions.
A code specifying a property reference for this supply chain reference.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.

referencedBy.comment: Inspection instructions related to this specified inspection result.
